head.supplied: We ¶ Carl Alexander ¶ by God's Grace ¶ Grand Duke of Saxe-Weimar-Eisenach ¶ Landgrave in Thüringia, Margrave of Meissen, princely Count of Henneberg, Lord of Blankenhayn, Neustadt and Tautenburg &c...

div.p: From Carl Alexander, Grand Duke of Saxe-Weimar-Eisenach
RB MSS M200a.17, Library, Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;
p.seg: M's details have been entered by hand, and which the Grand Duke has signed.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
p.seg: Landgraf in Thüringen, Markgraf zu Meissen, gefürsteter Graf zu Henneberg, Herr zu Blankenhayn, Neustadt und Tautenburg etc.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
p.seg: als Oberhaupt und Grossmeister Unseres Hausordens der Wachsamkeit oder vom weissen Falken

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: den Direktor des botanischen und zoologischen Gartens zu Melbourne in Australien, Freiherrn von Müller zum Ritter erster Abtheilung

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
p.seg: Unsers Hausordens der Wachsamkeit oder vom weissen Falken gnädigst ernannt haben; worüber demselben das gegenwärtige, von Uns höchsteigenhändig vollzogene und mit Unserm Grossherzoglichen Staatsinsiegel versehene Diplom ausgefertigt worden ist.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p:
Carl Alexander
The Grand Duke's seal is impressed next to his signature.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: Landgrave in Thüringia, Margrave of Meissen, princely Count of Henneberg, Lord of Blankenhayn, Neustadt and Tautenburg &c

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: as Sovereign and Grand Master of our House Order of Vigilance or of the White Falcon

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: establish herewith that We have graciously appointed

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: the Director of the Botanical and Zoological Garden at Melbourne in Australia, Baron von Müller as Knight of the first rank

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: of our House Order of Vigilance or of the White Falcon, for which the present Diploma executed by us with our own hand and provided with our grand ducal seal has been drawn up for him.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;
